name: Oktoberfest: Haunting Grounds
summary: The Haunting Grounds update is here! 🧟‍♂️ A brand new coop shooter game inside Ghost Palace  👻 Co-op Mode – Survive 10 spooky waves together with 3 other players 🔫 Choose and Upgrade Your Weapons – Revolver, Rocket Launcher, or Magic Wand 🧠 Unique Enemies & Randomized Waves – No two runs are the same! 🏆 Climb the Leaderboard – Score big and fight smarter  💀 Haunting Grounds DLC – Available now in the Meta Store & in-game Get ready to run, gun, and survive the haunted fun!
